EmailTemplate.description: Email notification when a case has been rejected.
EmailTemplate.name: Case: DPT Case Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: DPT Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Has Been Rejected.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Investigator: {!Case.OwnerFullName}
The Complaint that you recently investigated, {!Case.Id}, for {!Case.Account} has not been approved. Please review the Case Comments and re-submit for approval after corrections have been made.
